io.spine.server.storage

Class RecordSpec<I,R,S>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.storage.RecordSpec<I,R,S>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - the type of the record identifier
    R - the type of the stored record
    S - the type of the source object on top of which the values of the columns are extracted
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MessageRecordSpec

    @SPI
public abstract class RecordSpec<I,R,S>
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines the specification of a record in a storage.

    Enumerates the record columns to store along with the record itself.

        Throws:
